properties.entry: SELECT * FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = Q.Q_MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND Q_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY Q_DATE DESC

INSERT INTO QNA ( Q_NO, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENT, Q_DATE, Q_STATUS, Q_GRADE, Q_CATEGORY, CL_NO, Q_MEM_NO, A_TITLE, A_CONTENT, A_DATE, A_MEM_NO, A_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_QANO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, 'Y', '0', ?, NULL, ?, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0, 'N' )
SELECT * FROM QNA WHERE Q_NO =? AND Q_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM QNA JOIN MEMBER ON Q_MEM_NO = MEM_NO WHERE Q_STATUS = 'Y' AND GRADE = 2 ORDER BY Q_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM QNA JOIN MEMBER ON Q_MEM_NO = MEM_NO WHERE Q_STATUS = 'Y' AND GRADE = 1 AND Q_GRADE = 0 ORDER BY Q_DATE DESC
UPDATE QNA SET A_TITLE = ?, A_CONTENT = ?, A_DATE = SYSDATE, A_MEM_NO = 0, A_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE Q_NO = ?
